title: Gamified Challenges for Physical Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate gamified challenges for physical activities into my applications so that elderly users can engage in enjoyable and motivating ways to stay active, improving their physical health and overall quality of life.

title: Adaptive Activity Recommendations
summary: As a developer, I want to create applications that provide adaptive activity recommendations based on the user's current health status so that elderly users can receive personalized and safe engagement suggestions that enhance their physical and cognitive well-being.

title: Progress Tracking and Reporting Tools – Integration with Third-Party Health Tracking Apps
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate third-party health tracking apps with ALFRED so that I can create scalable applications that provide comprehensive health monitoring for elderly users and facilitate real-time data sharing with caregivers.

title: User-Centric Activity Customization – Choice of Activity Types Based on User Interests
summary: As a developer, I want to enable customization of activities based on user interests so that elderly users can engage in meaningful physical and cognitive activities that improve their quality of life.

title: Health Monitoring Integration for Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to seamlessly integrate data from wearable health devices into the ALFRED system so that I can validate user activities and provide real-time health insights to elderly users and their caregivers.
